title: [Bug]: GTK 2/3 symbols detected. Using GTK 2/3 and GTK 4 in the same process is not supported
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

2.0.17 not starting on Debian 12 with error due to mixing od GTK versions.

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

2.0.17

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
Using the released package, it does not start and complains about GTK error. Any previous version is working.
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
